name: Sunflower Showers
description:
Programming Me

Artist Noodle (http://noodle.newgrounds.com/)

Chase after the raincloud and collect water in order to grow into a big, beautiful sunflower. Compete for highscores by completing the game as fast as possible.

Use the arrow keys o WASD to move
Follow the raincloud
Avoid lightning, mushrooms and the sun
There are 20 stages of growth to achieve
